product_name: Royal Robbins Kick It Shorts - Women's
long_description: Whether you're off for a hike or a game of disc golf, the women's stretch canvas Royal Robbins Kick It Shorts move freely with you and take on the rigors of the outdoors. Supple, durable Billy Goat(R) slub cotton canvas has a touch of spandex for comfortable stretch. Slub yarns offer unique texture and surface interest; shorts are garment-washed for softness. Fabric offers outstanding UPF 50+ sun protection. Tonal stitching; hand pockets and back flap pockets; metal logo rivet at back belt loop. Royal Robbins Kick It Shorts for women have an 8 in. inseam and regular fit.
short_description: Whether you're off for a hike or a game of disc golf, the women's stretch canvas Royal Robbins Kick It Shorts move freely with you and take on the rigors of the outdoors.
